cmt01: Specifies the target format. Also accepts a path to require a custom target.
json-module    JSON representation as a module
static         Static code without reflection (non-functional on its own)
static-module Static code without reflection as a module
options.cmt02: Keeps field casing instead of converting to camel case.
options.cmt03: Does not generate create functions used for reflection compatibility.
options.cmt07: Does not generate convert functions like from/toObject
options.cmt08: Does not generate delimited encode/decode functions.
options.cmt10: Does not output any JSDoc comments.
options.cmt11: Enfores the use of 'Long' for s-/u-/int64 and s-/fixed64 fields.
options.cmt12: Enfores the use of 'number' for s-/u-/int64 and s-/fixed64 fields.
options.cmt13: Enfores the use of message instances instead of plain objects

-c01: [Normal]          : Use Package Name and Message Name to Direct proto
[PackageCmd]      : Use Package Id and Message Id to Direct proto
[PackageCmdFast]  : Use Package Id and Message Id to Direct proto(faster and shorter than PackageCmd Mode
For [PackageCmd] [PackageCmdFast] Mode. Use packageID and cmdID mode for network use
if use packageCmdMode, add //$<ID:number> after package line and message line
defOptions.-c02: package cmd mode id format(for packageageCmdMode=true)
defOptions.-c05: import protobuf file(only available for nodejsMode=true)
